short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your Intelligent Search Assistant - Search within the pages via LLMs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Answie helps you to find meaningful information, faster. This extension adds a small icon near Google results, which displays answers from that page via LLMs.

Also, by clicking the icon while on an arbitrary web page, you can ask different questions based on that page.

This is a RAG system based on the search results of Google. Our goal is to help overcome information overload and increase productivity.

This is a work in progress. Stay tuned for updates.

Please let us know how we can improve your search experience. If you have any feedback, reach us at coffee@answie.com.
